meanings.definition: Not having official permission or approval.
meanings.sent1: The student's unauthorized absence from class was noticed by the teacher.
meanings.sent2: The unauthorized access to the computer system was a serious security breach.
meanings.sent3: The unauthorized party in the library was quickly shut down by the librarian.
meanings.sent4: The unauthorized parking in the reserved spot caused a lot of inconvenience.
meanings.sent5: The unauthorized use of the company's logo led to legal consequences.

meanings.definition: Done or carried out without permission.
meanings.sent1: The unauthorized modifications to the building violated safety regulations.
meanings.sent2: The unauthorized copying of the software was illegal.
meanings.sent3: The unauthorized taste test of the cake left crumbs everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The unauthorized exploration of the abandoned house was thrilling but risky.
meanings.sent5: The unauthorized sharing of confidential information resulted in a breach of trust.

meanings.sent1: The unauthorized sale of tickets led to chaos at the event.
meanings.sent2: The unauthorized use of the equipment voided the warranty.
meanings.sent3: The unauthorized shortcut through the garden trampled the flowers.
meanings.sent4: The unauthorized entry into the restricted area triggered the alarm.
meanings.sent5: The unauthorized disposal of hazardous waste polluted the environment.
